subsection_name: mat-ngu.json_2_Insomnia can be a sign of what diseases?
subsection_content:
What disease is insomnia or what disease can insomnia be a sign of is an issue that many people are concerned about. According to experts, insomnia can be a sign of a number of diseases such as:
Allergy; Arthritis; Heart disease; Thyroid problems; Gastroesophageal reflux disease; Hormonal changes: The average age in menopausal women is 50 years old. At this stage, hormonal changes can cause women to not sleep well; Mental illness; Sleep-related diseases (sleep apnea, sleep terrors, sleepwalking, etc.)
